t: Is Noxzema good for your face? - Quora
s: Answer: My 87 year old mother has used Noxema nightly for over 50 years and has beautiful skin. Because of her success I tried it once and my face became red and irritated. I stopped using it immediately. I think it is totally an individual reaction and should be used accordingly.

t: The Rise and Fall of Noxzema
s: May 21, 2018 - Noxzema was reportedly invented by a doctor named George Bunting, who built it into a highly profitable brand that his heirs sold to Procter and Gamble.
